app.title: Swimming Hall Schedules
app.description: Real-time availability for Espoo swimming halls

about.title: About This Project
about.description: This is a free, open-source project that provides a user-friendly interface to view swimming hall availability in Espoo. The information displayed here is the same as what's available on the official Espoo city website, but presented in a more accessible and easy-to-use format.
about.dataSource: Data is sourced directly from Espoo city's reservation system in real-time.
about.projectInfo: This project is created and maintained by volunteers to help the community access swimming hall information more easily.

bestOption.noSlotsAvailable: No available slots found at the moment. Try again later!
